Roadmap

What we’re working on

Delivery Playbook

  • Guidance on how we work and deliver digital services at Homes England. Covering delivery standards, agile ways of working, tools, processes and governance.

Just done

  • [Publish Online]
    We have been using the Delivery Playbook internally as a reference point to establish best practice. We've now made it publicly available online.

Up next

  • [Reporting]
    With the introduction of Project Online, we're evolving the way we capture project data, track project delivery and communicate progress with stakeholders.
  • [Assurance]
    Supporting Homes England meet our commitment to spend controls and ensuring
  • [Metrics]
    Collaboration through advanced technlogy face time, service as core &innovations as power makes our brand.
